name: Bygone Beach Days Set of Magnets
description:
These sweet little magnets measure 2.5cm in diameter and are taken from paintings by Joseph Fletcher R.B.A. ~ my Great Grandfather.
There are 8 in the set and are very vintage!

There are 8 watercolour paintings of beach scenes from the 1920's available. They all have amazing clouds and really give you a feeling of holidays or day trips to the seaside. Please visit my site for closer pictures of all the designs ~ www.bygonebeachdays.com

They are steel magnets and very strong for the size of them. Would look great on any fridge or memo board!

name: Bygone Beach Days Mounted Picture
description:
SALE ~ SALE ~ SALE

This sweet mounted picture is a copy of a painting by Joseph Fletcher R.B.A. ~ my Great Grandfather.

There are 8 watercolour paintings of beach scenes from the 1920's available. They all have amazing clouds and really give you a feeling of holidays or day trips to the seaside. Please visit my site for closer pictures of all the designs ~ www.bygonebeachdays.com

THIS IS FOR ONE PICTURE

The picture measures 13.5cm x 9.3cm and the mount measures 8" x 6" and comes sealed in a clear bag.

R.R.P. £4.00 each

name: Bygone Beach Days Large Greetings Card
description:
SALE ~ SALE ~ SALE

These beautiful greetings cards are taken from a painting by Joseph Fletcher R.B.A. ~ my Great Grandfather.

There are 8 watercolour paintings of beach scenes from the 1920's available. They all have amazing clouds and really give you a feeling of holidays or day trips to the seaside. Please visit my site for closer pictures of all the designs ~ www.bygonebeachdays.com

THIS IS FOR ONE CARD

It measures 14.8cm x 20.3cm and has a white border. It is a printed card mounted on to a greetings card, come with a matching white envelope and is blank inside for your own message.

R.R.P. £2.00 each
